# Azerbaijan Airlines {#sec-denial-azerbaijan}

- Downing of Azerbaijan Airlines flight 8243 was caused by birds
- Downing of Azerbaijan Airlines flight 8243 didn't happen
- Downing of Azerbaijan Airlines flight 8243 wasn't russian fault

:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
Russsia shot Azerbaijan Airlines flight 8243 then denied emergency landing
[<br></br>![Link to Wikipedia: Azerbaijan Airlines Flight 8243](../all_common_img/Wikipedia.png){height=1em}](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azerbaijan_Airlines_Flight_8243)

The Azerbaijan Airlines flight 8243 Baku-Grozny was shot down by a Russian Pantsir-S1 air Defence system, the Azerbaijani agency AnewZ claims. Russia denied emergency landing in Grozny, hoping the plane and proofs drop into the sea.
